title: Khloé Kardashian's ex French Montana is engaged to a ROYAL Princess
description: The 40-year-old rapper and 31-year-old princess got engaged this past June.
content:
Khloé Kardashian’s ex French Montana has confirmed that he will be tying the knot with Dubai Princess Sheikha Mahra Mohammed Rashed Al Maktoum.

The 40-year-old rapper and 31-year-old princess got engaged this past June, a publicist for the rap artist confirmed to TMZ on Wednesday.

The couple decided to take the plunge after Montana made his debut appearance as a model at Paris Fashion Week for 3.Paradis' Ready to Wear Spring/Summer 2026 show.

The couple have been seen at venues such as the Pont des Arts in Paris; eateries in Dubai and Morocco and on 'desert escapades by camelback,' sources told the outlet.

Both sides of their families are excited' for the wedding, the date is still under review, the outlet reported.

The Unforgettable rapper, whose real name is Karim Kharbouch, was initially linked to the princess in October 2024 - around a full decade after his romance with the youngest of the Kardashian sisters.

Last fall, the Casablanca, Morocco-born musical artist and royal beauty had been seen together in a clip in which she was seen leading him on a tour of her native Dubai.

The No Stylist performer and princess were witnessed holding hands as they stepped out earlier this summer during Paris Fashion Week.

Princess Sheikha Mahra revealed she was breaking up with her estranged spouse, Sheikh Mana bin Mohammed bin Rashid bin Mana Al Maktoum, more than a year ago.

The princess said in a July 2024 post on Instagram: 'Dear Husband. As you are occupied with other companions, I hereby declare our divorce.

The post, which has since been deleted, continued: 'I divorce you, I divorce you, I Divorce You.'

The pair are parents to a one-year-old daughter, whose name they have not announced to the public yet.

The Another One of Me artist said in a 2016 segment for Elle that he found relationships with women who were involved in divorces to be 'real emotional' and 'a sensitive space for them.'

Montana added, 'It's real s***. But sometimes you have to sacrifice for what you want.'

Montana, who recently released the single Pack U Up with Cash Cobain, dated Khloé in 2014. He was linked to Pretty Girls artist Iggy Azalea in 2016.

Khloé is finishing her summer with an eye on self-care, as she took to Instagram to open up about a 'Muse' stem cell treatment she received at the Eterna Health clinic during a vacation to Mexico with sister Kim and their kids.

'I recently had the most INCREDIBLE experience that I had to share,' said the Los Angeles native, who has more than 301 million followers on Instagram. 'Plus no one likes a gate keeper hehe.'

Khloé continued: 'I work out 5 days a week so having something to help with recovery, inflammation and overall wellness, is next level.

'Not to mention the bonus of anti-aging (maybe my favorite perk).'

Khloé continued, 'I’m in awe of the science and so hopeful for the future. My dream is that one day treatments like this will be accessible and affordable to everyone, everywhere.

'I know what a privilege this treatment is and I feel so incredibly blessed we were able to receive it and with such great care.'

The reality star and mom-of-two thanked staffers 'for taking such amazing care of me and my sister' Kim, adding that she's fallen in love with stem cells and will be 'coming back soooooooon.'

Khloé - who is mother to daughter True, seven, and son Tatum, three, with her ex-boyfriend, NBA journeyman Tristan Thompson, 34 - said 'the bonus of anti-aging' was also a key selling point to undergoing the treatment.

'She's just so incredible and has taught me so much. But, the one thing I would take from how my dad was with us is unconditional love. It's the entire point of family.'
Thankfully, Khloe has the unconditional support of her sisters Kim, Kourtney and Kendall and Kylie as well as mother Kris, amid the cheating scandal that has rocked her blissful relationship with Tristan.

They have been together for several months.
And now it looks like the relationship between Iggy Azalea and French Montana is staying strong as summer romance turns into fun for the holidays.
On Sunday evening the 31-year-old rapper and the 26-year-old songbird went on a date night to Halloween Horror Nights inside Universal Studios Hollywood.
Scroll down for video...
Date night: French Montana shared this Snapchat with girlfriend Iggy Azalea from when they visited Halloween Horror Nights inside Universal Studios Hollywood on Sunday
Azalea had her blonde locks nicely styled and appeared to have a grey sweater over a black tank top on.
French wore a black top with a yellow and red lightening icon.
The ex of Khloe Kardashian was also seen posing with several male pals outside a candy store at the Studios.
Dolled up for her man: Azalea had her blonde locks nicely styled and appeared to have a grey sweater over a black tank top on
Styled for his siren: French wore a black top with a yellow and red lightening icon

The two were seen inside a VIP golf cart about to enter the studio in a Snapchat video.
According to E! News, the pair 'was holding hands' as they visited several of the theme park's mazes including the American Horror Story and The Walking Dead attractions.'
They also went on the rides Revenge of the Mummy and Jurassic Park in the Dark.
It all started back in July: Iggy and French, center, were hanging out in Las Vegas
That look of love: The two beamed at each other as they partied at the Aria Resort
'At one point, French grabbed Iggy and put his arm around her and pulled her close as they were walking through a scare zone,' another source said.
'It looked like they were having a good time.'
The two started spending time together in July. They said they were collaborating on a project. 'I've got another single coming out with French Montana, so we recorded it while I was in Las Vegas last week,' she told E! News.

'It should be having a music video filmed to it in the next few weeks.'
Iggy has been spending more time in Los Angeles to be near French. She recently rented a $20,000 a month home.
Meanwhile, Azalea put back her third album for six months to deal with her break-up from her cheating former fiance Nick Young. Talking to DailyMail.com in September, the Australian rapper revealed she scrapped the album's first draft after finding out the basketball star's mistress was pregnant with his child.
'I feel really confident about it,' she told DailyMail.com of her album. 'I was ready to release it in July and it's no secret I had my personal life fall apart and I really felt like I really needed the time, a few months to collect myself.'

French Montana is honored for helping raise more than $226M for healthcare in Africa
French Montana has been honored for his efforts to change and save lives.
The Pencils of Promise charity honored the diamond-selling rapper, 37, on Thursday for his efforts as an innovator that helped raise more than $226 million for healthcare in Africa, including funds for the Budondo Suubi “Hope” Health Center.
The facility is the primary source of healthcare for new mothers and their babies in an otherwise desolate region of Uganda.
Honor: French Montana, 37, has been honored by the Pencil of Promise charity for his efforts to change and save lives
The ceremony took place in New York. The BET Hip Hop award winner began his humanitarian efforts after traveling to Uganda to shoot the video for Unforgettable in 2017.
In an interview with TMZ the artist praised the group's working saying they are 'doing groundbreaking work globally to keep kids in school and make sure they have a safe environment to learn. This reminds me of my humble beginnings growing up in Morocco when I didn't know how to speak English.'
Speaking from experience, the Moroccan native explained, 'Education was fundamental to my journey immigrating to the U.S. and starting my career as an artist, which is why this work is so important to our youth.'
Innovator: The diamond-selling rapper was named an innovator for his effort to raise millions of dollars for healthcare in Africa
Humanitarian: The rapper was inspired to begin his humanitarian efforts after traveling to Uganda to shoot the video for Unforgettable
French also thanked his partners Global Citizen and Mama Hope.
The All Day artist stayed true to his personal style at the black-tie event, donning a pair of distressed blue jeans, a white Celine sweater and work boots.
He wore a diamond encrusted Coke Boys necklace and kept his hair and beard closely cropped.
Groundbreaking: French praised Pencils of Promise for their work to keep kids around the world in schools and make sure they have a safe place to learn. Seen here with PoP founder Adam Braun and CEO Kailee Scales
The recognition for humanitarian efforts comes as his latest song, Fenty, featuring Nav was released.
Meadow Walker, daughter of the late actor Paul Walker, was honored by PoP with their advocacy award.
Since 2019, the model has been a key advocate of PoP’s WASH (water, sanitation and hygiene) program.

French Montana Engaged to Dubai Princess Sheikha Mahra
French Montana & Dubai Princess We're Engaged 💍
Allow TMZ Hip Hop to be the first to offer congratulations to French Montana and Sheikha Mahra, a Princess of Dubai ... the "royal" couple have an engagement to celebrate!!!
Love seems to be swirling in the air amid the pre-NFL season engagement of Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce ... but a rep for French tells us the couple got engaged during Paris Fashion Week in June, shortly after he stunted on the runway.
The two have been spotted together since 2024, from everywhere from mosques, to upscale restaurants in Dubai and Morocco, to magnifying their love at the Pont des Arts in Paris, and enjoying desert escapades by camelback.
We're told the exact wedding date and other exciting details are still being carved out, but both sides of their families are excited!!!
French just joined the sexy drill wave via his new collaboration, "Pack U Up," with Cash Cobain ... he's clearly already envisioning his wedding day!!!

argos_summary: French Montana, the former partner of Khloé Kardashian, has confirmed his engagement to Dubai princess Sheikha Mahra Mohammed Rashed Al Maktoum after meeting during Paris Fashion Week, and the couple has been seen together in Paris, Dubai, Morocco and desert outings, with families excited though the wedding date is still pending.  Khloé Kardashian recently revealed she underwent a Muse stem‑cell treatment in Mexico, praising its recovery and anti‑aging benefits, and shared the parenting technique she intends to pass on from her late father.  In addition, French Montana was honored by the Pencils of Promise charity for raising more than $226 million for healthcare in Africa.  The article also touches on Khloé’s new baby and her reflections on family support.
